document_data.name: Redhand Pool
document_data.mainbody: '''Redhand Pool''' was a small lake found near the village of [[Eveningstar]] in [[Cormyr]].
document_data.Geography: Redhand Pool was located just northwest of Eveningstar, within the [[Eveningstar Gorge]]. The [[Starwater River]] entered along its northwestern shore and continued through Eveningstar, exiting the lake on its southeastern shore.
